name: Can City Chaos
description:
Cans are causing causing chaos in the city! Explore a short platformer adventure full of evil cans and crazy townspeople. Use your skills (and your hammer) to find out what's causing the cans to go crazy.

--Controls--

arrow keys to run and jump

z to swing hammer

down arrow to use doors

--Credits--

Shoie: Art and Sound Design

Dacks: Coding and Animations
